value.title: Export Power BI to MS Word / PDF | Paginated reports with Power Automate and Power BI
value.excerpt: In today's video I will show you how to export a Power BI file to word or PDF and email it to somebody!!  Chapters: 00:00 Intro 00:35 Pre-requisites / Licenses 01:00 Prepare the word template 05:00 Configure the flow in Power BI  Done! value.title: Do you need a date table for time intelligence in Power BI? Nope! (Quick Measures)

value.title: Drilling into drillthrough in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick looks at how you can use the drillthrough feature within Power BI Desktop. He also looks at how you can drill to multiple fields at the same time. value.title: Dynamically change chart axis in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick builds on a blog post from Scott Senkeresty to dynamically change the axis of your visual within Power BI. This uses a combination of Power Query and DAX. value.title: Embed a dashboard from Power BI into your application

value.title: Design a data model in Power BI
value.excerpt: The process of creating a complicated data model in Power BI is straightforward. If your data is coming in from more than one transactional system, before you know it, you can have dozens of tables that you have to work with. Building a great data model is about simplifying the disarray. A star schema is one way to simplify a data model, and you’ll learn about the terminology and implementation of them in this module. You will also learn about why choosing the correct data granularity is important for performance and usability of your Power BI reports. Finally, you’ll learn about improving performance with your Power BI data models.

value.title: Publish and share in Power BI
